tool_description:
## Omniinfer API: Fast Image Generation for 10,000+ Models  - Get Started For Free!

💡 **Features:** Text-to-Image / Image-to-Image / ControlNet / LoRA / Inpainting, supporting over 10,000+ models (including Stable Diffusion 1.x/2.x, SDXL 1.0, following civitai models, sfw / nsfw, 18+ / no 18+, hentai / no hentai, dreamlike, 3D, realistic, anime, realism, comic, fantasy, quality porn, art ).

🚀 To obtain a higher call limit and unlock additional features, please visit the site: [https://omnii...
title: Omniinfer

api_list.name: Text to Image
api_list.description:
For asynchronous image generation, only a task_id will be returned. You should use the task_id to make a call to the /v2/progress API endpoint in order to retrieve the image generation results.

The output is provided in the format of "image/png".

The request cost is influenced by the following parameters: width, height.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com/v2/txt2img"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Generate an image of a futuristic city skyline at sunset.
Create a fantasy landscape with dragons flying over mountains.
Show me a realistic portrait of a woman in Renaissance clothing.
Make an anime-style illustration of a group of friends at a summer festival.
Produce a comic book cover featuring a superhero in action.
Generate a 3D render of a futuristic sports car.
Create an inpainting of a missing section in a classic painting.
Show a dreamlike scene with floating islands and waterfalls.
Make a high-quality art image of a cat sitting on a windowsill.
Generate a fantasy portrait of an elf queen in a magical forest.

api_list.name: Progress
api_list.description:
This page will help you get started with text to image. Support ControlNet. 
Note if you get "status":0 in the response, please try this endpoint later untill the status become to 2

utterances.utterance: Can you check the progress of image generation for task_id 12345abc?
What's the current status of my image creation with task_id 987zyx?
Give me an update on the image generation for task_id task_2024_01.
How far along is the image for task_id img_task_555?
Please provide the progress details for task_id abcd1234efgh.
Check the status of my ControlNet image with task_id cn_7890.
Is the image generation complete for task_id progress_321?
Show me the current progress for task_id omni_8888.
What is the latest update for the image task with task_id 2024gen_77?
Can you tell me if the image for task_id task_alpha_01 is ready?

api_list.name: Get Models
api_list.description: This page will help you get started with text to image. Support ControlNet.

utterances.utterance: Show me all available models for text-to-image generation.
List the checkpoint models I can use for image generation.

api_list.name: Text to Image
api_list.description:
For asynchronous image generation, only a task_id will be returned. You should use the task_id to make a call to the /v2/progress API endpoint in order to retrieve the image generation results.

The output is provided in the format of "image/png".

The request cost is influenced by the following parameters: width, height.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com/v2/txt2img"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
